name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear Cookies, Storage, and Reload Page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears the cookies clears the storage and reloads the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clean the page cookies, clear the page storage and reload page.
Enjoy using it!

Known limitations: does not clean HttpOnly cookies, only cleans cookies in current page domain.
